text: grāmīṇa aṟabikaḷil ninnuṁ pinnēākkaṁ māṟi ninnavarēāṭ nī paṟayuka: kanatta ākramaṇaśēṣiyuḷḷa oru janavibhāgatte nēriṭānāyi niṅṅaḷ vaḻiye viḷikkappeṭuṁ.avar kīḻaṭaṅṅunnat vare niṅṅaḷ avarumāyi yud'dhaṁ ceyyēṇṭivaruṁ. appēāḷ niṅṅaḷ anusarikkunna pakṣaṁ allāhu niṅṅaḷkk uttamamāya pratiphalaṁ nalkunnatāṇ‌. mump niṅṅaḷ pintiriññu kaḷaññatupēāle (iniyuṁ) pintiriññu kaḷayunna pakṣaṁ vēdanayēṟiya śikṣa avan niṅṅaḷkku nalkunnatumāṇ‌
